title: Game crashes before load screen
body: Every time after champ select my client goes to champ select but bug splats before loading in. I then can't reconnect into the game until everyone else has reconnected and started the game. I've updated drivers, reinstalled league, and initiated full repair. Please help!

replies.body: Aw that's frustrating! There might either be game file corruption or driver issues that's failing to render the game after transitioning to the game server.  It's weird that the steps you've taken haven't helped though.  :/  In this case download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs, and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our Tech team should be able to get more context and see if there's something else causing this.  We'll see you there and reply back as soon as we can!
I'm actually having the same issue.  I cant even spectate games if I wanted to... I've never had this issue before.
